Home → Recommendations & reviews → Music → New music for February 2015

New music for February 2015

Written by Brandon King · Published Jan 30, 2015

Shadows in the night by Bob Dylan

New studio album featuring interpretations of Frank Sinatra tracks. Dylan performs 10 songs and standards. Dylan describes it as “lifting songs out of the grave and bringing them into the light of day”.

Unguarded by Rae Morris

Singer songwriter’s debut album, inspired by the likes of PJ Harvey, Kate Bush and Feist.

Wallflower by Diana Krall

Multi-Grammy-award-winning singer performs songs that have inspired her since the late 1960’s. Expect material by The Mamas and Papas, Elton John and an unreleased Paul McCartney composition.

Smoke + mirrors by Imagine Dragons

Second album from the Grammy-award-winning band. Hook laden pop with echoes of OneRepublic, Coldplay and U2.

Panda Bear Meets the Grim Reaper by Panda Bear

Animal Collective member returns with Brian Wilson-esque vocals and ’90s hip-hop inspired beats.

Brandon King

I work in the Suffolk Libraries Stock Team
